title:
Hi, 

Do those discount bulk ice machines, like the one at the intersection of Goldsboro Ave and Lake Park Blvd in Carolina Beach, have to pass Health Department inspections and water purity testing? 



Thanks
text:
Here's a link to state health requirements for public ice equipment
used in restaurants and other facilities. If you have any specific
questions, you might want to contact the county health department.
